data.text: @bribriggs @msjellman @historysandoval @JoeMarquez70 You know it! 🤣🤣🤣🎉 GET READY! https://t.co/SjHys4E0n6

@annkozma723 @msjellman @historysandoval @JoeMarquez70 And some are not pleasant conversations 😢
@msjellman I used just some scotch magic tape and taped my card in my passport. Comes off if needed and a good way to store/show when traveling.

@msjellman @cueinc @MrNunesteach @mrsmapess @annkozma723 @historysandoval @k_shelton @TxTechChick @Martinez_EdTech @JoeMarquez70 @MrsPateHistory so I cant just show up with my proof of vaccination card?
@msjellman @VictoriaTheTech @jcorippo I always have it on me.

@msjellman @historysandoval @cueinc @MrNunesteach @mrsmapess @k_shelton @TxTechChick @Martinez_EdTech @JoeMarquez70 @EDUcre8ive @MrsPateHistory Lots of convos happening this week in CA -- some school mandates lift Friday at midnight & new protocols for schools start Monday next week. I'm curious to see what next week brings? See you all soon! 💚

@historysandoval @cueinc @MrNunesteach @mrsmapess @annkozma723 @k_shelton @TxTechChick @Martinez_EdTech @JoeMarquez70 @EDUcre8ive @MrsPateHistory I’m honestly surprised they are doing this with all of the new mask mandates being lifted!
